metadata.Title: CVE-2019-2024 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
In em28xx_unregister_dvb of em28xx-dvb.c, there is a possible use afterfree issue. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-111761954References: Upstream kernel

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-2024` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500 - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500mc - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-smp - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-emb - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-smp - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.11.0-12.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-142.168~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-142.168~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-142.168~14.04.1

linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-142.168~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-142.168~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-142.168~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-142.168~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-142.168~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.11.0-12.19').
